== Introduction ==

This is the roadmap for `sbt`.  The current goals are mainly documentation and testing.

Comments and suggestions are welcome.

== Documentation ==

This list describes the documentation to be done.

 * API Documentation, especially:
  * Project and subclasses
  * Path and related classes
 * Basic Configuration
  * Defining tasks
 * Parallel execution

== Testing ==

 * Dependency analysis
 * General framework for running tests on sample projects
